description: A classic men’s chukka, this versatile sneaker boot is crafted from waterproof-grade materials and uses our new tread pattern for improved traction on loose terrain. The Forsake Mason Chukka also provides all-day comfort thanks to a thicker midsole and Memory Foam Footbed.
name: Forsake Mason Chukka - Mens

specs.value: Waterproof-grade full grain leather resists moisture absorption and water damage
Full length EVA midsole provides underfoot cushion and shock absorption
